title: YECA SERIF PROYECT
content:
The first sketches.  
Simply serif font three weights in one width.

Thanks in advance. et

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [tarjeton\_yeca.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150123080204/http:/typophile.com/files/tarjeton_yeca.pdf) | 57.4 KB |
author: fontime

comments.content: Very interesting. I like the way the glyphs are not all perfectly optically aligned so that at 12pt they "dance" a little. I wonder if they dance a bit too much. Perhaps you could tell us more about your intentions? How do you see this face being used?

Querido Edu:

Muy lindo proyecto. Produce una mancha dura, como si estuviera compuesto con City. Sugerencias: hacer más horizontales los trazos medios en s y e. (Melior marca el camino).

Nos vemos pronto.

Un abrazo,

Pablo Cosgaya
